mapper.insert: insert into common_label (userID, label_name,label_en_name,en_name_simple,status, createTime, modifyTime,style,sort, tagType) values ( #{userID}, #{labelName}, #{labelEnName}, #{enNameSimple}, 1, unix_timestamp(now()), unix_timestamp(now()), #{style}, #{sort}, IFNULL(#{tagType}, 1) )
mapper.select: select label_id labelId,userID,label_name labelName,label_en_name labelEnName,en_name_simple enNameSimple,createTime,modifyTime,style,sort from common_label where userID = #{userID} and status = 1 and tagType = 1 order by sort desc, createTime asc
mapper.update: update common_label set label_name = #{labelName}, label_en_name = #{labelEnName}, en_name_simple = #{enNameSimple}, style = #{style}, modifyTime = unix_timestamp() where label_id = #{labelId}
update common_label set status = #{status}, modifyTime = unix_timestamp() where label_id = #{labelId}
update common_label set sort = #{sort}, modifyTime = unix_timestamp() where label_id = #{labelId}
mapper.select: select label_id from common_label where label_name = #{labelName} and userID = #{userID} and tagType = #{tagType} and status = 1

select label_id labelId,userID,label_name labelName,label_en_name labelEnName,en_name_simple enNameSimple,createTime,modifyTime,style,sort from common_label where userID = 0 and status = 1 and tagType = 2 order by sort desc, createTime asc
